entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 89 %

Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
